dataflow.name: excel_write_plugins_s3_adls
dataflow.definition:
{"name":"excel_write_plugins_s3_adls","description":"Â ","version":0,"livyServerId":0,"engineVariableName":"","components":[{"udfNames":[],"componentId":0,"componentName":"startComponent","tableName":"","category":"Start","componentType":"UDF","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.UDFComponent","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"format":"csv","enableSchema":"N","schema":[],"fileMetadata":[],"enableTrim":"N","componentId":2,"componentName":"File 2","tableName":"File_2","category":"Source","componentType":"File","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"CSV_upendar","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"delimiter":",","header":"true","inferSchema":"true","path":"expected_csv2.csv"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.FileComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"code":"from py4j.java_gateway import java_import
java_import(spark._sc._jvm, "org.apache.spark.sql.api.python.*")

from azure.storage.filedatalake import DataLakeServiceClient
import os
import json
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from io import BytesIO
from datetime import datetime


java_object = spark.sparkContext._jvm.com.datagaps.core.engine.utils.CodeUtils.getConnectionParams("$[source_datasource]", "read")

data_source_details_list = [java_object.toList().apply(i) for i in range(java_object.size())]
data_source_details = {i._1(): i._2() for i in data_source_details_list}


storage_account_name = data_source_details["storage-account"]
storage_account_key = spark.sparkContext._jvm.com.datagaps.core.engine.utils.CodeUtils.getDecryptedPassword(
	data_source_details["access-key"])
file_system_name = data_source_details["container"]
folder_path = data_source_details["path"]
date_folder = datetime.now().strftime("%Y/%b/%d")
file_path = os.path.join("$[dataflow_name]", date_folder,"$[dataflow_run_id]", "$[input_dataset]"+".xlsx")


service_client = DataLakeServiceClient(account_url="{}://{}.dfs.core.windows.net".format(
	"https", storage_account_name), credential=storage_account_key)
file_system_client = service_client.get_file_system_client(file_system=file_system_name)
directory_client = file_system_client.get_directory_client(folder_path)
file_client = directory_client.create_file(file_path)


excel_file = BytesIO()

sdf=spark.sql("select * from "+"$[input_dataset]")
sdf.toPandas().to_excel(excel_file, engine="openpyxl", index=False)
excel_file.seek(0)


file_contents = excel_file.read()
file_client.append_data(data=file_contents, offset=0, length=len(file_contents))
file_client.flush_data(len(file_contents))


print(f"Excel File({os.path.join(file_system_name, folder_path, file_path)}) Created Successfully.")","kind":"pyspark","dataSourceId":0,"componentId":4,"componentName":"Code 4","tableName":"","category":"Processor","componentType":"Code","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.CodeComponent","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"pluginId":"945d8429-f254-4b16-b48e-04b9e5e7babd","pluginName":"Write a Dataset to Excel File into S3","pluginOptions":{"parameters":[],"inputDatasets":[{"inputDatasetId":"cb9cdc55-c683-414e-bd12-3d80d7c08726","fieldName":"input_dataset","displayName":"Select Dataset","value":"File_2"}],"outputDatasets":[],"dataSources":[{"paramId":"cdb20ad7-e9ef-405a-979b-550a0a01b1ef","fieldName":"source_datasource","displayName":"Select Excel Data Source","value":"1923"}]},"componentId":3,"componentName":"Plugin 3","tableName":"Plugin_3","category":"Processor","componentType":"Plugin","rank":0,"displayRows":0,"dependencies":[2],"options":{},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.PluginComponent","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"pluginId":"9e1df996-9ff7-4a24-ac0f-0005c18386d2","pluginName":"Write a Dataset to Excel File into ADLS","pluginOptions":{"parameters":[],"inputDatasets":[{"inputDatasetId":"cb9cdc55-c683-414e-bd12-3d80d7c08726","fieldName":"input_dataset","displayName":"Select Dataset","value":"File_2"}],"outputDatasets":[],"dataSources":[{"paramId":"cdb20ad7-e9ef-405a-979b-550a0a01b1ef","fieldName":"source_datasource","displayName":"Select Excel Data Source","value":"1917"}]},"componentId":5,"componentName":"Plugin 5","tableName":"Plugin_5","category":"Processor","componentType":"Plugin","rank":0,"displayRows":0,"dependencies":[2],"options":{},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.PluginComponent","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"}],"isDeleteWorkSchemaTable":"N"}
